0.text: 1. Adverbs are mainly formed by adding –ly to the adjectives.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Adverbs are mainly formed by adding –ly to the adjectives.</prosody></speak>

1.text: Adjective Adverb slow slowly high highly quick quickly unexpected unexpectedly sad sadly kind kindly neat neatly beautiful beautifully careful carefully safe safely warm warmly
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective Adverb slow slowly high highly quick quickly unexpected unexpectedly sad sadly kind kindly neat neatly beautiful beautifully careful carefully safe safely warm warmly</prosody></speak>

2.text: e.g. :- Raj is a kind person. (adjective) He spoke kindly. (adverb) It was a safe journey. (adjective) They reached Jaffna safely. (adverb)
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. :- Raj is a kind person. (adjective) He spoke kindly. (adverb) It was a safe journey. (adjective) They reached Jaffna safely. (adverb)</prosody></speak>

3.text: 2. Adverbs that are also used as adjectives.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. Adverbs that are also used as adjectives.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Adjective Adverb hard hard fast fast early early
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective Adverb hard hard fast fast early early</prosody></speak>

5.text: e.g. :- It was a fast train. (adjective) The train went fast. (adverb)
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. :- It was a fast train. (adjective) The train went fast. (adverb)</prosody></speak>

6.text: 3. 'Well' is the adverb of the adjective 'good'.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. 'Well' is the adverb of the adjective 'good'.</prosody></speak>

8.text: e.g. :- He is a good student. (adjective) He studies well. (adverb )
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. :- He is a good student. (adjective) He studies well. (adverb )</prosody></speak>
